        protected void add_tokens_v10()

      • verify_card_tokens

        public boolean verify_card_tokens(Card c,
                         int[] token_number)
        Verifys if the tokens selected are legitimate.
        Parameters:
        c - the card to check from.
        token_number - the array with the values corresponding to the tokens bet.
        Returns:
        true if passes the tests.

      • verify_district

                      int district)
        Verifys if a given card can be played in the given district.
        Parameters:

        district - the number of the district to play.
        Returns:
        true if can be played.
